GetPrescriptionToSuspend
Method.Implementation:
set PrescriptionSQL = ##class(%ResultSet).%New() ;Create Result Set Object
set querySQL = "SELECT " set querySQL = querySQL_" MEDPrescriptionLine.PrescriptionNumber, " set querySQL = querySQL_" MEDPrescriptionLine.FREE4, " set querySQL = querySQL_" MEDPrescriptionLine.FREE1, " set querySQL = querySQL_" MEDPrescriptionLine.FREE2, " set querySQL = querySQL_" VARDose.PrevisaodeAdministracao, " set querySQL = querySQL_" MEDPrescriptionLine.Line " ;set querySQL = querySQL_" VARDose.Linha " set querySQL = querySQL_" FROM MEDPrescriptionLine AS MEDPrescriptionLine " set querySQL = querySQL_" JOIN VARDose AS VARDose ON MEDPrescriptionLine.PrescriptionNumber = VARDose.Prescricao " set querySQL = querySQL_" WHERE MEDPrescriptionLine.FREE4 <> 5 AND MEDPrescriptionLine.FREE4 <> 4 AND MEDPrescriptionLine.FREE2 IS NOT NULL AND VARDose.Administradoem IS NULL"
do PrescriptionSQL.Prepare(querySQL) ;Prepare Query do PrescriptionSQL.Execute() ;Execute Query
While (PrescriptionSQL.Next()) { set idPrescricao = PrescriptionSQL.GetData(1) set statusPrescricao = PrescriptionSQL.GetData(2) set strMotivoSuspensao = PrescriptionSQL.GetData(3) set hrInicioPrescricao = PrescriptionSQL.GetData(4) set dataAdministracao = PrescriptionSQL.GetData(5) set idPrescricaoLinha = PrescriptionSQL.GetData(6) set hrInicioDose = $piece(dataAdministracao,$$$COMMA,2) set hrAtual = $piece($horolog,$$$COMMA,2) set dtAtual = $piece($horolog,$$$COMMA,1)
if (($piece(dataAdministracao,$$$COMMA,1) < dtAtual ) && (hrInicioPrescricao - hrAtual < 0)){ if (hrInicioDose < hrAtual){ do ..SuspendPrescription(idPrescricao,idPrescricaoLinha,strMotivoSuspensao) } } } quit
